item.title: Appveyor
item.description: Appveyor ä¹Ÿæ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¾çº¿ä¸Š CICD å·¥å…·ã€‚ Support Contexts: Windows (Default) Ubuntu MacOS Support Languages: Node.js io.js Xamarin Python Ruby C++ Go Ruby version: 1.0.{build}-{branch} skip_commits: files: - 'azure-pipelines.yml' - 'README.md' install: - set PATH=C:\Ruby26-x64\bin;%PATH% - bundle install build: off before_test: - ruby -v - gem -v - bundle -v test_script: - rails db:migrate RAILS_ENV=test Appveyor.yml Reference # Notes: # - Minimal appveyor.yml file is an empty file. All sections are optional.
